name: the-invisible-users
description: Designing the Web for AI Agents and Everyone Else - Book manuscript and Web Audit Suite implementation

scripts.lint:markdown: markdownlint --config config/.markdownlint.json '**/*.md' --ignore node_modules --ignore packages/web-audit-suite/node_modules --ignore packages/bible --ignore packages/dont-make-ai-think --ignore packages/shared-appendices --ignore packages/shared-code-examples --ignore .claude --ignore docs/repo --ignore config
scripts.lint:markdown:fix: markdownlint --config config/.markdownlint.json --fix '**/*.md' --ignore node_modules --ignore packages/web-audit-suite/node_modules --ignore packages/bible --ignore packages/dont-make-ai-think --ignore packages/shared-appendices --ignore packages/shared-code-examples --ignore .claude --ignore docs/repo --ignore config
scripts.illustrations:generate: node scripts/download-cover-images.js && cd packages/bible/illustrations && for svg in *.svg; do png="${svg%.svg}.png"; echo "Converting $svg to $png..."; magick convert -density 300 -background white -alpha remove -alpha off -depth 8 "$svg" "$png" 2>/dev/null || convert -density 300 -background white -alpha remove -alpha off -depth 8 "$svg" "$png"; done && echo "✓ All PNG illustrations generated (8-bit RGB)"
scripts.pdf:bible-html: pandoc packages/bible/chapters/executive-summary.md packages/bible/chapters/preface.md packages/bible/chapters/chapter-*.md packages/bible/chapters/Glossary.md packages/bible/chapters/The-End.md -o outputs/the-bible/the-invisible-users.html --resource-path=packages/bible--standalone --toc --toc-depth=2 --metadata title='The Invisible Users' --metadata subtitle='Designing the Web for AI Agents and Everyone Else' --metadata author='Tom Cranstoun' --metadata date='January 2026' && echo '✓ HTML generated: outputs/the-bible/the-invisible-users.html (open and print to PDF using ⌘+P)'
scripts.pdf:bible-generate: pandoc packages/bible/chapters/metadata.yaml packages/bible/chapters/executive-summary.md packages/bible/chapters/preface.md packages/bible/chapters/chapter-*.md packages/bible/chapters/Glossary.md packages/bible/chapters/The-End.md -o outputs/the-bible/the-invisible-users.pdf --resource-path=packages/bible--pdf-engine=xelatex --listings --toc --toc-depth=2 -V geometry:margin=1in -V fontsize=11pt -V documentclass=book -V papersize=a4 -V linkcolor=blue && echo '✓ PDF generated: outputs/the-bible/the-invisible-users.pdf'
scripts.pdf:bible-kindle: pandoc packages/bible/chapters/metadata-kindle.yaml packages/bible/chapters/executive-summary.md packages/bible/chapters/preface.md packages/bible/chapters/chapter-*.md packages/bible/chapters/Glossary.md packages/bible/chapters/The-End.md -o outputs/the-bible/the-invisible-users-kindle.pdf --resource-path=packages/bible--pdf-engine=xelatex --listings --toc --toc-depth=2 -V geometry:paperwidth=6in -V geometry:paperheight=9in -V geometry:inner=0.625in -V geometry:outer=0.5in -V geometry:top=0.625in -V geometry:bottom=0.625in -V fontsize=11pt -V documentclass=book -V classoption=openright -V linkcolor=black && echo '✓ Kindle PDF generated: outputs/the-bible/the-invisible-users-kindle.pdf'
scripts.pdf:bible-simple: pandoc packages/bible/chapters/executive-summary.md packages/bible/chapters/preface.md packages/bible/chapters/chapter-*.md packages/bible/chapters/Glossary.md packages/bible/chapters/The-End.md -o outputs/the-bible/the-invisible-users-simple.pdf --resource-path=packages/bible--pdf-engine=xelatex --toc --toc-depth=2 -V geometry:margin=1in -V fontsize=11pt -V linkcolor=blue --metadata title='The Invisible Users' --metadata subtitle='Designing the Web for AI Agents and Everyone Else' --metadata author='Tom Cranstoun' --metadata date='January 2026' && echo '✓ Simple PDF generated: outputs/the-bible/the-invisible-users-simple.pdf'
scripts.pdf:bible-all: npm run illustrations:generate && npm run pdf:bible-html && npm run pdf:bible-kindle && npm run pdf:bible-generate && npm run pdf:appendix
scripts.pdf:dont-html: pandoc packages/dont-make-ai-think/chapters/chapter-*.md -o outputs/dont/dont-make-ai-think.html --resource-path=packages/dont-make-ai-think/chapters --standalone --toc --toc-depth=2 --metadata title="Don't Make AI Think" --metadata subtitle="Designing Web Interfaces for AI Agents" --metadata author="Tom Cranstoun" --metadata date="January 2026" && echo '✓ HTML generated: outputs/dont/dont-make-ai-think.html'
scripts.pdf:dont-generate: pandoc packages/dont-make-ai-think/chapters/chapter-*.md -o outputs/dont/dont-make-ai-think.pdf --resource-path=packages/dont-make-ai-think/chapters --pdf-engine=xelatex --listings --toc --toc-depth=2 -V geometry:margin=1in -V fontsize=11pt -V documentclass=book -V papersize=a4 -V linkcolor=blue --metadata title="Don't Make AI Think" --metadata subtitle="Designing Web Interfaces for AI Agents" --metadata author="Tom Cranstoun" --metadata date="January 2026" && echo '✓ PDF generated: outputs/dont/dont-make-ai-think.pdf'
scripts.pdf:dont-kindle: pandoc packages/dont-make-ai-think/chapters/chapter-*.md -o outputs/dont/dont-make-ai-think-kindle.pdf --resource-path=packages/dont-make-ai-think/chapters --pdf-engine=xelatex --listings --toc --toc-depth=2 -V geometry:paperwidth=6in -V geometry:paperheight=9in -V geometry:inner=0.625in -V geometry:outer=0.5in -V geometry:top=0.625in -V geometry:bottom=0.625in -V fontsize=11pt -V documentclass=book -V classoption=openright -V linkcolor=black --metadata title="Don't Make AI Think" --metadata subtitle="Designing Web Interfaces for AI Agents" --metadata author="Tom Cranstoun" --metadata date="January 2026" && echo '✓ Kindle PDF generated: outputs/dont/dont-make-ai-think-kindle.pdf'
scripts.pdf:dont-simple: pandoc packages/dont-make-ai-think/chapters/chapter-*.md -o outputs/dont/dont-make-ai-think-simple.pdf --resource-path=packages/dont-make-ai-think/chapters --pdf-engine=xelatex --toc --toc-depth=2 -V geometry:margin=1in -V fontsize=11pt -V linkcolor=blue --metadata title="Don't Make AI Think" --metadata subtitle="Designing Web Interfaces for AI Agents" --metadata author="Tom Cranstoun" --metadata date="January 2026" && echo '✓ Simple PDF generated: outputs/dont/dont-make-ai-think-simple.pdf'
scripts.pdf:dont-all: npm run pdf:dont-html && npm run pdf:dont-kindle && npm run pdf:dont-generate
scripts.audit:allabout: cd packages/web-audit-suite && rm -rf .cache results && cd ../.. && npm run start -w packages/web-audit-suite -- -s https://allabout.network/sitemap.xml --log-level info

author: Tom Cranstoun
